Game.Name: Franklin the Turtle (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Sv,No,Da,Fi) (Rev 2)
Game.plot: Overview:Franklin the Turtle is an educational game developed by InterActive Vision Games and published by The Game Factory for Game Boy Advance.Franklin the Turtle is based on the children's cartoon of the same name.
Game.Notes: Franklin the Turtle is a Miscellaneous game, developed by InterActive Vision Games and published by The Game Factory, which was released in 2005.
